title: NBA Star Lamar Odom Remains Critical In Coma
text: NBA Star Lamar Odom Remains Critical In Coma By Suman Varandani 17 hours 34 minutes ago Font size: https://www.flickr.com/photos/kalooz/4015088008 Lamar Odom's condition remains critical as he is still in coma and his heart is failing, TMZ reported early Wednesday, citing sources. The former Los Angeles Lakers star was reportedly found unconscious at a Nevada brothel after days of nonstop partying. Lamar, the ex-husband of Khloe Kardashian, is having serious problems with his kidneys and lungs,â€¦
